FEATURES :

Established in the best tradition of the great hits Age of Empires and Age of Kings, it is worthy of a place in the collection of any , even the most advanced player ! Nine absolutely different peoples, each of them - the unique skills and talents over . Epic battles in the atmosphere of ancient legends and tales. Here are fighting even the ancient gods of Greece , Egypt and the Scandinavian countries. After all, this is the era when the flow of blood is shed , and people worship the great inhabitants of heaven . Era of myths and legends ! The publication also includes the official continuation of the game - The Titans. Players will take control of an entirely new race and create the most destructive creature - a giant battle of titanium ! With his participation battle acquire , unprecedented scope and sweep to the ground the enemy hordes became more interesting and much more pleasant.


Features Extended Edition:
Age of Mythology
Age of Mythology: The Titans
Golden Gift Campaign.
Features repack :
Do not cut / recoded
